name: BasementPartySociety
0:
”Alexa, open basement party society”
”Alexa, start basement party society”
”Alexa, ask basement party society what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: basement party society
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Basement Party Society was born out of the desire to bring you music that moves your soul and make you wanna get up and dance.

Back in the day, growing up, I remember the house & basement parties where we’d party to music that wasn’t on mainstream radio, like the Bar-Kays, T-Connection, Narada Michael Walden, Larry Graham, and...but I’m showing my age….anyways, the basement party was where it was at.

Basement Party Society is a group of DJ’s from various backgrounds, regions of the world and experiences, united in our love for, and creating music.

Creating & playing music for your enjoyment is our passion.
Getting you to sweat, dancing, or whatever else ; -) ...
is our goal.

A huge thank you to our DJs for bringing your creativity to our listeners, and for sharing the vision that is continuing to make this dream emerge."
- HW & JP
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
